speaker:
FIRST
               
              GROOM
text: More rushes, more rushes.

speaker:
SECOND
               
              GROOM
text: The trumpets have sounded twice.

speaker:
FIRST
               
              GROOM
text: ’Twill be two o’clock ere they come

speaker:
FIRST
               
              GROOM
text: from the coronation. Dispatch, dispatch.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Stand here by me, Master Robert Shallow. I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: will make the King do you grace. I will leer upon

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: him as he comes by, and do but mark the countenance

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: that he will give me.

speaker: PISTOL
text: God bless thy lungs, good knight!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come here, Pistol, stand behind me.—O, if I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: had had time to have made new liveries, I would

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: have bestowed the thousand pound I borrowed of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you. But ’tis no matter. This poor show doth better.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: This doth infer the zeal I had to see him.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: It doth so.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: It shows my earnestness of affection—

speaker: SHALLOW
text: It doth so.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: My devotion—

speaker: SHALLOW
text: It doth, it doth, it doth.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: As it were, to ride day and night, and not to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: deliberate, not to remember, not to have patience

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: to shift me—

speaker: SHALLOW
text: It is best, certain.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: But to stand stained with travel and sweating

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: with desire to see him, thinking of nothing else,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: putting all affairs else in oblivion, as if there were

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: nothing else to be done but to see him.

speaker: PISTOL
text: ’Tis semper idem, for obsque hoc nihil est; ’tis

speaker: PISTOL
text: all in every part.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: ’Tis so indeed.

speaker: PISTOL
text: My knight, I will inflame thy noble liver, and

speaker: PISTOL
text: make thee rage. Thy Doll and Helen of thy noble

speaker: PISTOL
text: thoughts is in base durance and contagious prison,

speaker: PISTOL
text: haled thither by most mechanical and dirty hand.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Rouse up revenge from ebon den with fell Alecto’s

speaker: PISTOL
text: snake, for Doll is in. Pistol speaks nought but truth.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I will deliver her.

text:
There
               
              roared
               
              the
               
              sea
              ,
               
              and
               
              trumpet-clangor

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Shallow, I owe you a thousand pound.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: Yea, marry, Sir John, which I beseech you to

speaker: SHALLOW
text: let me have home with me.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: That can hardly be, Master Shallow. Do not

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you grieve at this. I shall be sent for in private to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: him. Look you, he must seem thus to the world.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Fear not your advancements. I will be the man yet

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: that shall make you great.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: I cannot well perceive how, unless you

speaker: SHALLOW
text: should give me your doublet and stuff me out with

speaker: SHALLOW
text: straw. I beseech you, good Sir John, let me have five

speaker: SHALLOW
text: hundred of my thousand.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Sir, I will be as good as my word. This that

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: you heard was but a color.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: A color that I fear you will die in, Sir John.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Fear no colors. Go with me to dinner.—

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come, lieutenant Pistol.—Come, Bardolph.—I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shall be sent for soon at night.
